alert.note: Alert for Lafourche; Terrebonne (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 16 at 1:18AM CDT until April 16 at 2:00AM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: The National Weather Service in New Orleans has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Terrebonne Parish in southeastern Louisiana... East central Lafourche Parish in southeastern Louisiana... * Until 200 AM CDT. * At 118 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles southeast of Montegut, or 11 miles southwest of Galliano, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Cut Off, Galliano, Larose and Golden Meadow. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
